background: Production-ready secure AWS infrastructure deployment using Terraform in us-west-1. Implements comprehensive security controls with AWS Secrets Manager for RDS credential management using auto-generated 32-character passwords, SSE-KMS encryption on all storage (S3, RDS, EC2 volumes), least privilege IAM roles and security groups, WAF protection with 4 managed rule sets for common exploits, 2 NAT Gateways for high availability across 2 AZs, CloudWatch monitoring with SNS email notifications, AWS Backup with daily backups and 30-day retention, IAM password policy enforcement, and complete network isolation with public/private subnet architecture. Single-file Terraform implementation (tap_stack.tf) with 991 lines of infrastructure code including Secrets Manager integration, 162 passing unit tests, and 55 passing integration tests. Follows AWS Well-Architected Framework for security, reliability, and operational excellence with comprehensive tagging strategy (Environment=Production, Team=DevOps) for governance and cost tracking.
author: koushik-turing
